plot: A group of young people in a rehab program out in the country find out that the legends of the Icelandic Yule men (Santa Claus) are very real and very terrifying. The story takes place the night after the first attack.
title: Örstutt jól
plot_es: A group of young people in a rehab program out in the country find out that the legends of the Icelandic Yule men (Santa Claus) are very real and very terrifying. The story takes place the night after the first attack.
